A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Probably the fairest way to judge this movie without saying it's absolutely awful or it's absolutely amazing is that it's a decent movie\, but it's not a good star wars movie. As a star wars fan\, this really hurt. There were too many plot holes and inconsistencies and they treated our beloved characters from old movies like a punching bag. If you've never seen a single star wars movie or you just don't care about the franchise\, then you can enjoy this movie as it has good action\, and a mildly entertaining story line. Overall it's just disappointing.
